altTitles.en: I’ll be Taking a Break for Personal Reasons

description.en:
My name is Yu Il-shin, and I'm a shitty, third-rate novelist.
My name might be "Only God" in Korean, but don't actually pray to me. It's just a name.

This one random day, I finally get my wish of awakening... but my ability is kind of strange.

I'm able to connect to a small world through my smartphone, where the weak ants there worship me as god!

A legend spreading among the whole universe says whoever collects Zaha Sanko's bones will have any kind of wish granted. 
Thus, he and his skeletal buddy Avakian will use their dark powers to fend off any murder attempts while they search through 
space for whoever put this curse on Sanko’s bones: killing them might end the madness.
description.ru: С самого детства Заха Санко боролся за свою жизнь. Как гласят легенды, если вы завладеете костями Захи Санко, вам исполнится любое желание. Вместе со своим другом Авакяном и силой тьмы Заха путешествует по космосу, чтобы найти человека, который проклял его кости и положил конец их жизни.

title.en: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister

altTitles.fr: Se Marier avec une Sœur Amagami
Comment j'ai Marié une Sœur Amagami

altTitles.es-la: El Emparejamiento de la Familia Amagami

description.en: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine. A tale of love and miracles is about to unfold!
description.fr: Kamihate Uryuu, orphelin depuis l'enfance, reçoit une invitation à séjourner dans le sanctuaire shinto local. Tout ce qu'il voulait, c'était un endroit tranquille pour étudier afin de réaliser son rêve d'entrer dans une grande école de médecine, mais en arrivant sur place, il tombe sur trois belles demoiselles du sanctuaire... Le prêtre en chef lui demande d'épouser l'une d'entre elles et de prendre la succession du sanctuaire. Une histoire d'amour et de miracles est sur le point de se dérouler !
description.ja: 京大医学部を目指す高校生の上終 瓜生。児童養護施設育ちの瓜生は「甘神神社」の宮司さんに引き取られ、居候することに。受験勉強ができる環境があれば…と思っていたが、居候の条件は「婿養子として神社を継ぐ」こと!? しかも結婚相手は同居する巫女三姉妹!! 一つ屋根の下、巫女と紡ぐ恋と奇跡の物語、開幕!!
description.ru: Камихатэ Урю долгое время прожил в приюте, пока не был взят под опеку священником Тидори Амагами. Остановившись в храме, Урю узнаёт, что здесь живут три жрицы-сёстры, которые являются внучками главного священника. В конечном итоге, Тидори Амагами рассказывает, что взял парня под опеку, чтобы он женился на одной из его внучек и унаследовал храм, как его зять. Так начинается история любви и чудес с семьёй Амагами.
description.es-la: Un chico que había perdido la fe en las Oraciones y los Dioses, de pronto conocerá a 3 hermosas Hermanas que son Doncellas del Templo donde comenzará a vivir, ¿Esto afectará de alguna Manera a nuestro Protagonista? Léelo para descubrirlo.

description.en: This is a world where all people have the hope of becoming gods. Taking the path of the Thunder God, one can become a Thunder God. After taking the path of Mountain God, one can become a Mountain God. After becoming a god, one can open up a divine kingdom. The crossover Lai Cang had no money and no talent to take the God path, but in an accident, he became the first in history to open up God kingdom before becoming a God!
description.zh: 这是一个所有人都有希望成神的世界。走雷神神途，可成为雷神。走山神神途，可成为山神。成为神灵之后，可开辟神国。穿越者黎苍没钱没天赋，无法走神途，却在一次意外中，成为了历史上第一个还没成神就开辟了神国的神途者！

description.en:
In a large mansion lives a boy, an aristocrat who was cursed by the witch to "let everything he touches die." With him is his maid Alice, who besides serving him, likes to tease him. The boy who is interested in her doesn't mind the teasing, but not being able to touch her is painful!  
  
If they are unable to hold hands, how will their love ever bloom?
description.tr: Hikâye büyük bir malikanede yaşayan kaderi bir cadı tarafından mühürlenen bir çocuk ve onunla beraber yaşayan hizmetçi Alice hakkında; çocuk dokunduğu her şeyi ölüme sürüklerken; Alice ile hiç el ele tutuşamayacak olmalarına rağmen yaşanan inişli çıkışlı bir aşk.

description.en:
Princess Llewelyn, who was once an outstanding princess but was now miserably abandoned. An ugly curse has been placed upon her with no one to protect her. It is a curse that makes her lust for men. In order to stop her curse, Llewelyn opens her bedroom... Four men are entangled with the abandoned princess. Will the truth of the curse be revealed? And who will be the man who will end up with her?

---
**Notes:**
* *The Secret Bedroom of a Dejected Royal Daughter* is the official English title of the Korean novel.
* Naver changed the webtoon's rating from R15 to R19. The novel is still R15, it has never released as R19. Naver R19 rating for the webtoon is more of a mature R17.

description.fr:
La princesse Lewellyn avait tout pour elle. Jusqu'au jour où sa mère s'est fait exécuter pour avoir tenté de maudire le prince héritier. Depuis, elle vit ses jours délaissée par les siens et harcelée par la reine douairière. Elle ne rêve plus que de pouvoir entrer à l'abbaye pour s'échapper du palais et vivre une vie chaste. Mais le dieu démon Asmodeus lui a infligé la malédiction de la luxure, la faisant plonger dans le désir. Parviendra-t-elle à cacher ses ébats de princesse lubrique et à se rappeler de l'homme qui a pris sa virginité?

Jonathan Joestar, a young wealthy son living in Victorian England, has his life destroyed by a recently orphaned Dio Brando, who was taken in by Jonathan's father. Dio, who plots to drive Jonathan to insanity and inherit the Joestar fortune, becomes an unstoppable vampire that Jonathan must fight.

description.en:
Shiori was once a guitarist in a light music club in high school. But her first live performance was dashed when her brother ran away from home with a lot of debt, to become a musician in Tokyo.  
  
A decade later, Shiori is now a high school teacher, leading a boring, uneventful life and paying off the debt… till she runs into the ghost of none other than a famous guitarist Jim-you-know-who.  
  
A story of a 27-year-old woman on her way to a music legend begins here.
description.ru: История о Шиори, скромной и неуклюжей 27-летней школьной учительнице, которая любит играть на гитаре и общается с призраком Джими Хендрикса.
description.pt-br: Shiori era uma guitarrista em um clube de música no colégio. Mas sua primeira apresentação ao vivo foi frustrada quando seu irmão fugiu de casa deixando um monte de dívidas para se tornar um músico em Tóquio. Uma década depois, Shiori é agora uma professora do ensino médio, levando uma vida monótona e entediante pagando as dívidas... Até ela dar de cara com o fantasma de ninguém menos que um famoso guitarrista chamado Jim-você-sabe-quem. A história de uma mulher de 27 anos de idade, a caminho de uma lenda musical começa aqui.

altTitles.es-la: El camino del campeón hacia el Murim

description.en:
“Mister Perfect”

A living legend in the realm of mixed martial arts, the Champion, Kim Sanghyuk, was somehow reborn in the Murim world as the youngest son of Keum Hojang!

“This time, I’ll forge a new legend in the Murim!”

Against the backdrop of martial artists and untrained fighters scattered around Murim comes an oddity trained in Boxing, Taekwondo, Muay Thai, Wrestling, Jujitsu, Capoeira, Judo, and a variety of modern martial arts, ready to shake up the Murim!
The year is 2206, and mankind has only 100 years left on planet Earth. The "Nation-Toppling Battle", a war with the survival of each country on the line, begins!!

description.ar: روم-كوم عن صبي مدرسة ثانوية خجول ولطيف من مدرسة البيسبول يلتقي بطالبة منتقلة جديدة بمفردها. فيعلم عن تعرضها للاعتداء ولكن بطريقة ما تبدو هذه الفتاة غريبة نوعًا ما لأنها فجأةً طلبت منه المال لمساعدتها!
description.en: Hoshino, a member of the baseball club meets Yamada, a classmate who has just transferred to his new school. She cries loudly that she was "mugged" and makes a certain "request" to him. The world's funniest master-slave relationship between a clueless girl and a good-natured little guy is about to begin.

altTitles.en: Diary of our Days at the Breakwater

description.en:
Hina Tsurugi and her family have just moved to a quaint seaside town. Hoping to savor the sight of the peaceful ocean, Hina stumbles upon a girl named Yuuki Kuroiwa - an upperclassman at her new school - who invites Hina to join her in fishing. Hina reels in an octopus, which falls onto her; being afraid of bugs and big creatures, she panics and begs Yuuki to remove it from her. Yuuki sees this as an opportunity to force Hina to join the school's Breakwater Club - a club where members gather, catch, and eat various types of marine life as their main activity.  
Although her attempts to refuse to join fail, Hina slowly begins to discover the hidden joy in fishing. Her view on the sport changes, now looking forward to all the delightful experiences she can take part in alongside her fellow club members. Surrounded by eccentric club members, how will Hina’s high school life turn out?
description.ru: Главная героиня, старшеклассница Хина Цуруги, проживает в небольшом приморском городке, ходит в школу и предпочитает спокойное времяпрепровождение дома активному отдыху на природе. Поэтому она очень удивилась, когда, выбравшись на прогулку, встретила на набережной знакомую ученицу, Юки Куроиву, с энтузиазмом предложившую ей вступить в клуб «Тэйбо» и заняться рыбалкой! К собственному изумлению, Хина согласилась! Как будет развиваться её школьная жизнь теперь, когда она находится в окружении весёлых и эксцентричных членов клуба?

description.cs:
Láska je rozprávka. Alebo je? Koktavá dáma Maxi - najstaršia dcéra rodiny Croysovcov, vyrastá zneužívaná svojím otcom je nakoniec donútená vstúpiť do manželstva s rytierom Riftanom. Novomanželia spolu strávia prvú noc, po ktorej okamžite Riftan odchádza na výpravu. O tri roky neskôr sa triumfálne vracia ako slávny rytier. Všetky rozprávky sa končia svadbou a šťastným osudom. Ich láska sa začala svadbou - toto nie je rozprávka. Aké sú Riftanove zámery? Nájde Maxi silu prekonať svoju traumu a nedostatok sebadôvery? Prežije dvojica a nájde lásku napriek všetkým prekážkam?

---
**Note:** Although the novel is R19, the webtoon is R15.

---

description.en:
The daughter of a duke, the stuttering Maximilian, married a knight of lowly status at her father’s coercion. After their first night, her husband departed for an expedition without another word. He came back three years later, this time as a famous knight in the whole continent. How will Maximilian face him on his return?

"The more I think of you, the more lonely and lonely I become. I don't know why I can't quit even though it's so painful."

---
A flawless love story of the flawed. Stuttering lady Maximilian is forced into a marriage with Sir Riftan, but he leaves on a campaign after their wedding night. Three years later, he triumphantly returns, ready to cherish her. As life with her husband finally begins, she only has one question — does she deserve this love and happiness?

---
**Note:** Although the novel is R19, the webtoon is R15.

description.hu:
A dadogós Maximiliant házasságra kényszerítik Riftannal, aki azonban a nászéjszaka után hadjáratra indul. Három évvel később diadalmasan visszatér, készen arra, hogy újra a lánnyal legyen. Ahogy a várva várt örömteli élet elkezdődik a férjével, a lánynak csak egy kérdése van: Vajon megérdemli-e ezt a szerelmet és boldogságot?

description.it:
La figlia di un duca, la balbettante e insicura Maxine, sposò un cavaliere di umile condizione per la coercizione del padre. Dopo la loro prima notte, suo marito partì per una spedizione senza aggiungere altro. Tornò tre anni dopo, questa volta come famoso cavaliere in tutto il continente. Come l'affronterà Maxine al suo ritorno? "Più penso a te, più mi sento solo e vuoto. Non so perché, ma non riesco a smettere di pensarti anche se è così doloroso."

description.ru:
Дочь герцога, заика Максимилиана, вышла замуж за рыцаря низкого происхождения по настоянию её отца. После первой же ночи её муж отправился в военный поход, не сказав ни слова на прощание. Три года спустя он возвращается уже как рыцарь, прославленный на весь континент.
Как же теперь Максимилиана встретит его?

description.th:
“แม็กซิมิเลียน” ลูกสาวของดยุคผู้พูกติดอ่างถูกบังคับให้แต่งงานกับอัศวินที่ไร้ซึ่งยศถาบรรดาศักดิ์ “ริฟแทน” เพียงแค่คืนเดียวหลังวันแต่งงานริฟแทนก็ได้ออกเดินทางเพื่อทำศึกโดยไร้ซึ่งคำบอกกล่าวใด ๆ เมื่อเวลาผ่านไป3ปี เขาได้กลับมาพร้อมกับชัยชนะในฐานะของอัศวินผู้มีชื่อเสียงของอาณาจักร แล้วทีนี้แม็กซิมิเลียนจะเผชิญหน้ากับการกลับมาของเขาได้อย่างไร? "ยิ่งคิดถึงคุณเท่าไหร่ ฉันก็ยิ่งรู้สึกเหงาและเหงามากขึ้นเท่านั้น ฉันไม่รู้ว่าทำไมถึงไม่หยุดคิดเสียที แม้ว่ามันจะเจ็บปวดมาก็ตาม"

Bir dükün kızı olan kekeme Maximilian, babasının zorlamasıyla düşük statülü bir şövalyeyle evlendi. İlk gecelerinden sonra, kocası başka bir söz söylemeden bir sefer için yola çıktı. Дочка герцога, заїка Максимілліан, через свого батька, насильно вийшла заміж за лицаря низького статусу. Після першої шлюбної ночі, він не проронивши ні слова відправився на експедицію. Після якої повернувся вже відомим на всьому континенті Майстром мечу. Як Максимілліан зустріне його?
«Чим більше я думаю про тебе, тим більш мені стає самотньо. Я не знаю чому я не можу покинути тебе, хоч це і робить мені так боляче.»

天生性格内向、有些口吃的公爵家小姐，在父亲的强迫之下嫁给了平民出身的骑士。大婚之夜过后边奔赴战场的丈夫，3年之后成为了全大陆最知名的骑士，荣归故里。我似乎听到了他的呢喃，“这些年越想起你，越觉得自己很孤独。我想找到，为何如此痛苦却始终对你放心不下的原因。”

title.en: The Reincarnated Assassin Is a Swordmaster

altTitles.es-la: El asesino reencarnado es un genio de la espada

description.en:
Raon was once a loyal assassin for House Robert until Derus killed him. Not willing to give up, Raon prayed for vengeance and woke as a member of House Sieghart, the most powerful noble house!

He’ll need all of their near-infinite resources to get revenge. Though he carried over knowledge of a powerful Flame Link technique, he also carries the Curse of Bitter Frost, something that’s slowly killing him.

As if that weren’t enough, the demonic embodiment of Wrath is trying to take over his body!?
description.zh:
拉昂的一生就像一条拴着锁链的狗。
然而，造化弄人，他获得了新生
--即使他的怒火依然留在断裂的锁链之中。
终于能够自立，他决定按照自己的意愿生活。
“我会杀死一切阻挡我的人，神也不例外。”

altTitles.ja: おとなりコンプレックス

description.en: Kuji Akira and Ninomiya Makoto have been neighbours and friends from childhood. Akira is handsome and Makoto is pretty but Akira's a girl and Makoto's a boy… Their feelings for each other are growing more complex just as they are finding themselves the focus of romantic interest of their friends and acquaintances.

With the proliferation of organic robots called Gijins, humanity is enjoying prosperity in 23rd century Tokyo. But when a young man named Riaha meets a certain Gijin, he uncovers the dark truth of the world! From the creators of Hiasobi Domei!

As a child, Thorfinn sat at the feet of the great Leif Ericson and thrilled to wild tales of a land far to the west. But his youthful fantasies were shattered by a mercenary raid. Raised by the Vikings who murdered his family, Thorfinn became a terrifying warrior, forever seeking to kill the band's leader, Askeladd, and avenge his father. Sustaining Thorfinn through his ordeal are his pride in his family and his dreams of a fertile westward land, a land without war or slavery… the land Leif called Vinland.  

---
- **Won the Japan Media Arts Award Division Grand Prize in 2009**
- **Won the 36th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2012**
description.ru: Эта история случилась в начале XI века, когда викинги, безраздельно господствовавшие в северных морях, грабили побережья Франции и Англии. В эпоху, где оружие значило больше, нежели слова, маленький мальчик невольно оказывается косвенной причиной гибели своего отца. Повзрослев и став на путь воина, он жаждет честного поединка с убийцей отца – легендарным главарём отряда викингов-наемников, но возраст и отсутствие опыта не позволяют ему сделать это. Чтобы не упускать своего врага из виду, юноша вступает в его отряд и в награду за выполнение тяжелого боевого задания требует поединка с ним, но терпит поражение. Юноша продолжает прилагать все усилия, чтобы осуществить свою месть. Внезапно он оказывается вовлечён в куда более кровавое столкновение…
description.tr: Çocukken Thorfinn, büyük Leif Ericson'un ayaklarının dibinde oturur ve batıdaki uzak diyarların vahşi masallarıyla heyecanlanırdı. Ama gençlik hayalleri bir paralı asker baskınıyla paramparça oldu. Ailesini öldüren Vikingler tarafından yetiştirilen Thorfinn, grubun lideri Askeladd'ı öldürmek ve babasının intikamını almak isteyen korkunç bir savaşçı oldu. Thorfinn'i çileli yaşamı boyunca ayakta tutan, ailesiyle olan gururu ve batıdaki bereketli topraklara, savaşın ve köleliğin olmadığı bir ülkeye, Leif'in Vinland adını verdiği topraklara dair hayalleridir.
description.pt-br: Thorfinn é filho de Thors, um lendário guerreiro viking, mas que após anos no campo de batalha, descobre uma coisa mais maravilhosa que matar seus iguais. Viver sua própria vida, em paz. Mas os ventos lhe trazem uma notícia que atrapalhará seus dias de paz, e Thorfinn, seu filho, pouco sabe desta vida passada de guerra de seu pai. Após descobrir o passado de seu pai, Thorfinn se revolta contra ele, e sai para a guerra junto de seu pai, mas quando reconhece o verdadeiro valor dele, já é tarde demais. Agora Thorfinn deverá seguir sua própria vida, seguindo valores que seu pai lhe ensinou, mas sem perder sua coragem. Este é só o começo desta grande saga de Thorfinn que acompanha os Vikings no século XI!

title.en: Tonari no Neko to Koi Shirazu

altTitles.ja: となりの猫と恋知らず

altTitles.en: The Feline Neighbor and the Unversed-in-Love

description.en: Minato Seno, who has always been very shy since he was young, struggled to make friends during his first few days of high school. He also never got a glimpse of his classmate Nekozane-san's face, as she was always asleep at the desk next to him. However, one day after school, a chance encounter revealed a side of Nekozane-san that was completely different from the one Minato knew in the classroom.

altTitles.th: นักฆ่าย้อนวัย

description.en:
After devoting his life to the crime organization, Glory Club, Pietro retires his status as a legendary killer and spends his remaining days running a quiet used bookstore.

But after being ambushed and nearly killed one day by the very organization he dedicated his life to, Pietro finds his body magically reverted back to its teenage years!

Now that Pietro was back to his peak physique, he sets out to settle the score with Glory Club!

---

description.pt-br: Um velho assassino que foi traído, agora está rejuvenescido! Mas… Ninguém o reconhece?! “Então eu sou o mais forte!”

description.en: Kim Jeonji, a problem child who caused violence every day while in school, injured his leg in a motorcycle accident, retired from active duty (?), and is living a good life as a social misfit. Then, one day, he gets into an argument with the old beggar on the overpass, and he does something against the old beggar.... The old man is supposed to be a 'God'?
description.ru:
Ты был легендой — стал никем,
Как старый лев среди шакалов.
Мечты все обратились в тлен,
Погребены среди завалов.

Увидев слабого, толкни,
Пусть и его жизнь станет адом.
Вот только даже в наши дни
Легенды оживают рядом. © RSC
description.pt-br: Faça o bem ou vá para o inferno. As condições de sua nova maldição parecem simples o suficiente para o outrora esperançoso bandido Kim Jeonji. Ou assim parece quando seu animado anjo da guarda aparece em sua porta um dia e o cura. Mas será que simplesmente fazer o que é necessário para ajudar as pessoas será o suficiente para apaziguar um deus mesquinho com rancor?

description.en:
After leaving his mark on Japan, Dai is taking on Europe!

Direct continuation of Blue Giant, a manga about the evolution of the young saxophonist Dai Miyamoto in the jazz world. Blue Giant Supreme sees our protagonist travel to Europe. Having just arrived in Munich, without being able to speak a word of German and with just average English, he manages to secure a roof over his head, food and drink, but struggles to get the most important thing: a place where he can have his music heard.
 
A whole new element added on top of the enthralling story that enchants every music lover: the discovery of a new culture. Dai will travel all over Europe, from Germany to France, accompanied by his instrument, growing as a musician and a person in the process of fulfilling his dream of becoming the best in the world.


[Official Site](https://bluegiant.jp/)

altTitles.en: The Legend of the President's Glasses

description.en:
A collection of short stories, centered around the theme of journey.

Table of Contents
Chapter 1: Harukoma
Chapter 2: The Pine Tree Occasionally Awakens
Chapter 3: Traveling Prince
Chapter 4: Six Months' Vacation
Chapter 5: The Girl Underwater
Chapter 6: How to Wake Up Your Lady
Chapter 7: The Legend of the President's Glasses
Chapter 8: Eru's House Sitting
Chapter 9: Family Ensemble
Chapter 10: Tazaki in the Desert
Chapter 11: Taro and Tayura
Chapter 12: Ran and the Gray World Extra
Chapter 13: Toki's Journey
Appendix
Afterword

Due to a near-death experience, a Japanese college student named Hiro gains the ability to see and converse with ghosts. By forming contracts with these ghosts, he becomes a powerful necromancer. But how will he fare in this strange new world?

"Are you the one who called me…?"

A black-haired beast looked at him with glowing yellow eyes.

"It’s okay. It won't hurt anymore. You'll be okay."

Estio was born as the youngest son of a farmer, but everyone hated him. He was a child who could read the hearts of people and animals. And…

"A cursed child."

He finally turned 19, and it was now time for his coming-of-age ceremony. Now starts Estio's journey to find happiness.

---
Estio is just an ordinary farmer's son, but with an extraordinary ability-he can read the thoughts and memories of humans and animals. For this, he is shunned by the people in his village, finding happiness only in his animal friends. After years of silently enduring the villagers' hostility, Estio runs away the night he turns 19. His journey brings unexpected friendships and encounters, but will such bonds be able to show him there is more to him and his ability than meets the eye?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%90%EC%8A%A4%ED%8B%B0%EC%98%A4/2761), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58509736)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/estio/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/96041)
description.fr:
«Es-tu celui qui m'a appelé...?»

Une bête aux cheveux noirs l'a regardé avec des yeux jaunes brillants.

«Tout va bien. Ça ne fera plus mal. Tu vas t'en sortir.»

Éstio est né comme le plus jeune fils d'un fermier, mais tout le monde le détestait. C'était un enfant qui pouvait lire dans le cœur des gens et des animaux. Et...

«Un enfant maudit.»

Il a finalement eu 19 ans, et c'est maintenant le moment de sa cérémonie de passage à l'âge adulte. Maintenant commence le voyage d'Éstio pour trouver le bonheur.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%90%EC%8A%A4%ED%8B%B0%EC%98%A4/2761), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58509736)

description.ko:
"날 부른 게... 당신입니까?"
까만 털의 짐승이 노랗게 빛나는 눈으로 그를 올려다보았다.
"이제 괜찮습니다. 더는 아프지 않을 겁니다. 괜찮으니까."

농가의 막내 아들로 태어난 소년 에스티오.
하지만 모든 사람들은 그를 미워했다.
사람과 동물들의 마음을 읽는 아이.
그리고...

"저주 받은 아이"

마침내 열아홉 살을 맞이한 성년식.
행복을 찾기 위한 에스티오의 여정이 지금 시작된다.

—

공든탑 작가님의 웹소설 인기작 <에스티오> 본격 웹툰화!
사람과 동물의 마음을 치유하는 여스티오의 여정에 함께 하세요!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%90%EC%8A%A4%ED%8B%B0%EC%98%A4/2761), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58509736)

**Official Translations:**

description.ru:
«Это ты звал меня?» Черношёрстный зверь смотрел на него снизу своими жёлтыми сияющими глазами. «Теперь всё хорошо. Больше не будет больно. Поэтому всё хорошо». Эстио – младший сын, рождённый в семье фермера. Но все люди его презирали. Он ребёнок, который читает души животных и людей. И… «Ребёнок, получивший проклятие». Наконец, церемония взросления, которая проводится, как только человеку исполняется 19 лет. И вот Эстио отправляется в путешествие, чтобы обрести своё счастье. По мотивам веб-романа известного писателя Кон Дынтхапа.

---

description.en:
Ryoma Echizen just joined the Seishun Academy's tennis team, which is known for being one of the most competitive teams in Japan. Its members are incredibly talented, gifted, and athletic. With rigorous and extremely intense practices, the upperclassmen of the team expect the very best from themselves and they expect even more from the new members of the team. While most of the freshmen are on pins and needles hoping they won't get cut from the team, Ryoma Echizen is confident, cool, and collected. Some might even say he's cocky, but at least he's got the skills to back up his attitude. With his virtually unreturnable "twist serve," Ryoma is sure to make the starting team.  
  
Join Ryoma and the other first years, as they train hard, make friends, and try to find a place for themselves on the team. Ryoma Echizen is the Prince of Tennis. He may be ready for the Seishun Academy tennis team, but are THEY ready for HIM?

title.en: Tensei Oujo wa Ai yori Ryouchi ga Hoshii no de Seiryaku Kekkon wo Kibou shimasu!

altTitles.ja: 転生王女は愛より領地が欲しいので政略結婚を希望します！

altTitles.zh: 转生公主比起爱更想要领地所以期望政治联姻！

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生公主比起愛更想要領地所以期望政治聯姻！

altTitles.en: The Reincarnated Princess Wants Territories Over Love so She Wants a Political Marriage

description.en:
Princess Fairis, reincarnated into the world of strategy simulation games, uses her knowledge of the games she played in her previous life and is called the Warrior Princess. However, as soon as the war ends, she is ordered by the king to marry. In addition, she competes with her sister in arranged marriages and, depending on her partner, cannot get involved in national politics. ...I want to build my country, not get married! As she struggles to arrange a political marriage that will give her more territory, Orpheed, a wizard who is also her trusted subordinate and a potential bride, unexpectedly confesses his love for her...?

A love comedy between a reincarnated princess with zero love skills and the strongest wizard with an intense love.

altTitles.en: Death God of the Drifting Moon

altTitles.fr: La faucheuse de la lune errante

altTitles.ja: 死神漂月〜暗闇からの刺客〜

altTitles.es-la: El Asesino de la Luna a la Deriva

description.de:
Pyo Wol ist ein einfaches Waisenkind und durchstreift alleine den gesamten Kontinent, bis er eines Tages auf einen mysteriösen Mann trifft und plötzlich das Bewusstsein verliert. Als er wieder zu sich kommt, befindet er sich in einem dunklen, engen Raum mit einer eisernen Tür als einzigem Ausgang. Irgendwie schafft Wol es, die nächsten grausamen Monate zu überleben, während er versucht, einen kühlen Kopf zu bewahren und seinen Körper auf das vorzubereiten, was folgen könnte. Als sich die eiserne Tür endlich öffnet, erfährt Wol, dass er an diesem schrecklichen Ort nicht alleine ist: Eine Gruppe Maskierter hat 300 Kinder entführt, um sie zu menschlichen Waffen auszubilden. Nun liegt es an Wol, zu kämpfen und die anderen umzubringen – denn nur die wenigsten können überleben und am Ende ausgewählt werden. Wird er es schaffen, seinen Kidnappern zu entkommen?

---

description.en:
He’s in the deepest part of the Jianghu. Keep your eyes wide open if you do not wish to get dragged into the abyss.

Kidnapped children raised 7 years in darkness for a single assassination mission that goes awry.

---
Pyo Wol was an orphan who wandered around the continent until he bumped into a mysterious man and lost consciousness. When he wakes up, he finds himself in a dark, confined space with only one iron door for an exit. Wol survives the next several grueling months, trying to keep a cool head and stay in shape. When the iron door finally opens, he discovers he's not the only one in this miserable situation. A group of masked people has kidnapped 300 children to train them into human weapons. Wol must fight and kill the others, for only a handful of the strongest will be selected. Will Wol be able to become one of the chosen and find a way to free himself from his captors?

title.en: Touhou Suichouka ~ Lotus Eater-tachi no Suisei

altTitles.en: The Lotus Eaters, Drunk and Sober
Touhou Drunken Butterfly Flower ~ Lotus Eaters' Sobering

altTitles.ja: 東方酔蝶華　ロータスイーター達の酔醒

description.en: In this sixth official Touhou manga series from ZUN, the shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei goes to investigate a strange rumor in the human village, where she gets involved with the local Geidontei bar and its poster girl, Miyoi Okunoda.
description.ja: 幻想郷の人里にある居酒屋「鯢呑亭（げいどんてい）」には、最近、飲んだ帰りの客が妖怪にさらわれて失踪するという噂が。博麗神社の巫女・霊夢はこの疑惑の調査に乗り出す。どうやらカギは看板娘の美宵のようで…？
description.es-la:
En la aldea humana de Gensokyo, un rumor sobre un youkai que supuestamente secuestra a personas alcoholizadas se extiende de forma repentina con gran rapidez, causando miedo y preocupación entre la gente. Mientras tanto, en el centro de este rumor, el bar izakaya Geidontei, no hay nada fuera de lugar en lo que respecta a su comida y bebida, o incluso con respecto a su propietario.

Cuando la sacerdotisa Reimu Hakurei se entera de la situación, intenta cumplir con su deber de investigar el sospechoso establecimiento. Sin embargo, el caso la lleva a otra persona: Miyoi Okunoda, cuya existencia parece ser tan volátil como una burbuja.
description.pt-br:
Uma estranha história sobre álcool. O mais novo mangá oficial de "Touhou", escrito por ZUN.   
  
Existe um rumor de que em um bar chamado "Geidontei", localizado em uma área remota de Gensokyo, um cliente bêbado foi sequestrado por um youkai. Reimu, sacerdotisa do Santuário Hakurei, embarca em uma investigação, mas aparentemente, a chave para desvendar o caso está na garçonete da loja…?

altTitles.es-la: Haikyu!! - La petición de Hinata es difícil

altTitles.ja: 最強の王様、二度目の人生は何をする？

description.de:
In einer Welt regiert durch die stärksten Kämpfer ist König Grey der unangefochten Stärkste, Reichste und Berühmteste. Aber eine solche Macht kommt Hand in Hand mit Einsamkeit. Unter der glamourösen Erscheinung eines mächtigen Königs liegt die leere Hülle eines Mannes, beraubt von Ziel und Willen.

Nach einer Wiedergeburt in eine Welt voller Magie und Monster hat der König die Möglichkeit, sein Leben erneut zu leben. Die Fehler seiner Vergangenheit zu korrigieren wird aber nicht seine einzige Herausforderung sein. Unter dem Frieden und Reichtum dieser neuen Welt lauert etwas, das alles vernichten kann, was er jemals erreicht hat, was seine Rolle darin und den Grund für seine Wiedergeburt in Frage stellt.
description.en:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.
description.fr:
Le Roi Grey a une force, une richesse et un prestige inégalés dans un monde gouverné par l'aptitude martiale. Cependant, la solitude s'approche de près derrière ceux ayant de grands pouvoirs. Sous l'apparence glamour d'un Roi puissant se cache la carapace de l'homme, dépourvue de volonté et de but.

Réincarné dans un nouveau monde rempli de monstres et de magie, le Roi a une seconde chance de revivre sa vie. Cependant, corriger les erreurs de sa précédente vie ne sera pas sa seule tâche. Sous la paix et la prospérité de ce nouveau monde se cache une menace sous-jacente remettant en question tout ce pour quoi il a travaillé, son rôle, et sa raison de renaître.
description.ja: 私は史上最強の「王」である。数多の敵を退け、数々の功績を残した歴代最高の覇王だ。 しかし、ある朝目覚めた私は奇妙な違和感を覚える。手足が短い、視界が極端に低い、見知らぬ男女が私を「アーサー」と呼び、微笑みながら覗き込む。そう…私は無力な赤子に転生してしまったのだ！最強の王様がいたいけな赤ちゃんに転生する、痛快冒険ファンタジー‼
description.pl:
Król Gray ma niezrównaną siłę, bogactwo i prestiż w świecie rządzonym przez umiejętności walki. Jednak samotność pozostaje tuż za tymi, którzy mają wielką moc. Pod olśniewającą powierzchownością potężnego króla kryje się skorupa człowieka, pozbawionego celu i woli.

Wskrzeszony w nowym świecie wypełnionym magią i potworami, król ma drugą szansę na ponowne przeżycie swojego życia. Jednak naprawienie błędów przeszłości nie będzie jego jedynym wyzwaniem. Pod pokojem i dobrobytem nowego świata kryje się ukryty nurt, który grozi zniszczeniem wszystkiego, na co pracował, kwestionując jego rolę i powód narodzin na nowo.
description.ru: Король Грей обладает непревзойденной силой, богатством и престижем в мире, во главе которого стоит боевая мощь. Однако одиночество обычно появляется именно у тех, кто обладает большой властью. Мало кто знает, но под гламурной внешностью могущественного короля скрывается оболочка человека, лишённого цели и воли.
description.pt-br:
Dizem que a solidão acompanha aqueles com grande poder. Permanecendo como um Rei com força incomparável, status, e fama… e muito mais. Eu, que uma vez lutei para viver, me afogava em meu raso trono sem nenhuma vontade ou propósito. Haviam muitos que tinham inveja de mim, mas eu diria de bom grado, “Tirem tudo de mim! Será meu presente!” Um dia, eu finalmente consegui meu presente – uma nova vida.

Com uma segunda chance de corrigir meus erros e cumprir meus arrependimentos, permita-me mostrar a você o que um (ex-rei) pode fazer!

altTitles.en: The Heavenly Demon Can't Live a Normal Life
The Reincarnation of the Dark Master

altTitles.uk: Небесний демон не може жити нормальним життям

altTitles.pt-br: O Demônio Celestial não pode viver uma Vida Normal

altTitles.es-la: El demonio celestial no puede llevar una vida normal

description.en:
“Is this a mission I was sent on by the gods? Or is this just divine punishment?”

Baek Jung-hyeok, the Heavenly Demon of Murim, finds that he’s been reincarnated into the body of Roman Dimitri, the dim-witted son of a baron who’s obsessed with the luxuries of the aristocratic lifestyle. But with his new status, Jung-hyeok is ready to shake things up on the continent of Salamander.

Will the divine demon accomplish what he’s set out to do? And will he finally get the answers to this mysterious reincarnation?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
description.ko:
천마 백중혁, 드미트리 가문의 장남으로 눈을 뜨다.
드미트리의 얼간이, 차남에게 밀린 장남.
세간의 평판은 중요하지 않다.
천마, 아니, 로만 드미트리는 앞으로 평범하게 살 수 없다.
압도하는 천마 판타지!

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
description.ru:
Демон Пэк Чун Хёк.
Некогда сильнейшая личность в Муриме умирает и обнаруживает себя в теле старшего сына дома Дмитрий. В теле человека, которого все называют дураком. Человека, который постоянно находится в тени своего младшего брата и которому глубоко плевать на мнение окружающих.
Но теперь, демон... Нет, Роман Дмитрий больше не сможет жить привычной жизнью.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
description.uk: "Це місія, на яку мене послали боги? Чи це просто божественна кара?" Пек Чжун Хьок, божественний демон, повелитель Муріма, виявляє, що він реінкарнувався в тіло Романа Дмитровича, недоумкуватого сина барона, одержимого розкішшю аристократичного способу життя. Але з новим статусом Чжун Хьок готовий перевернути все на континенті Саламандр. Чи вдасться божественному демону досягти того, що він задумав? І чи отримає він нарешті відповіді на загадки цього таємничого перевтілення?
description.zh:
最强教主重生成异国废柴！
天不亡我！今生注定不凡！
武林最强天魔神教教主白钟赫生命自然终结后再睁眼发现自己成为了卢曼·德米特里，德米特里公认的傻子，且不如弟弟的德米特里长子。但外人的评价已经不重要。从此卢曼将不再浑浑噩噩，他的生活将会发生天翻地覆的变化，卢曼注定不再平凡！

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
description.pt-br:
“O Demônio Celestial” Baek Joong-Hyuk abre os olhos como o filho mais velho da família Dimitry. Conhecido como o idiota da família, deixado de lado por causa do segundo filho. A opinião do mundo é irrelevante. “Demônio Celestial”, não, Roman Dimitry, não pode viver uma vida normal.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)

description.en: New life love with a quirky guy she met at the share house she moved into, and the cohabitation romance begins....

One day, a gate suddenly opened in the heavens, bringing with it the invasion of monsters and the intervention of monks in the human world.

『Miracle Drug “Coffee” Administration』

『Medicinal Contents: Caffeine and Sugar』
☞ Provides energy
☞ Stimulates the central nervous system
☞ Maximizes senses and reflexes

The whole world appeared to slow down, and Hanyul’s medications began to show their true effects.

Translated from Amazon.com.jp using google translate.

The latest work in the "Super Movable Girl" series, in which a moving beautiful girl figure rushes in and becomes a wife. A romantic comedy in which tiny cute [super movable girls] such as the girl-type planet explorer Nona, the RPG hero Bernoa, and the 2D fighting game character Subaru are involved in the otaku boy Haruto. If there is love, what is the size difference!?

altTitles.ja: 夏とレモンとオーバーレイ

description.en: A struggling voice actress who goes by the name of Yunimaru is barely making ends meet. Constantly thinking about when she will escape her miserable life, she's contacted by Konno Sayaka—a beautiful and successful woman working for a big company—with a job offer: to read a farewell letter at her own funeral. While grappling with whether or not to accept such an absurd job offer, Sayaka makes her a proposal that she can't refuse. Now with an opportunity to escape her situation, Yunimaru also finds herself aiding Sayaka in the completion of her letter.

description.ja: ネコと暮らす不思議な日常。猫創作マンガ

altTitles.ko: 만 년 만 에 귀환 한 플레이어

description.en:
Oh Kangwoo the Demon King has had it with ruling over Hell and wants to return to Earth. 

But when he finally gets there, not only are his powers sealed, but the Earth he once knew has turned into an MMORPG free-for-all. 

Dimensional gates have appeared all over the world, and "players" enter them to make a living by hunting monsters. If Kangwoo wants to survive in this dangerous game, he's going to have to level up, and fast. 

But for this demon king, hell on earth might be worse than Hell itself!
description.ko:
어느 날, 갑작스럽게 지옥으로 떨어졌다. 
가진 것은 살고 싶다는 갈망과 포식의 권능 뿐.
 
일천의 지옥부터 구천의 지옥까지. 수만, 수십만의 악마를 잡아먹었고. 
마침내 일곱 대공까지 그 앞에 무릎을 꿇었다.
 
"어째서 돌아가려고 하십니까? 
왕께서는 이미 지옥의 모든 것을 가지고 계시지 않습니까."

"가지긴 뭘 다 가져."

먹을 것도, 즐길 것도 없다! 
지옥에 있는 거라고는 황량한 대지와 끔찍한 악마 뿐! 

"난 돌아갈 거야." 

만 년이라는 아득한 시간 만에 그가 지구로 귀환한다.


그러나.. 지구는 자신이 그동안 알던 지구가 아니었다.
description.ru:
Внезапно оказавшись в Аду, всё, что у него осталось это вера и тяга к жизни. Он уничтожал тысячи демонов на всех кругах Преисподней. Даже семь верховных герцогов Ада пали после встречи с ним.

— Владыка, зачем вам обратно на землю? Вся Преисподняя в ваших руках!

— Заткнись и продолжай подготовку к обряду!

Ни вкусной пищи, ни привычных развлечений… лишь ужасающие демоны и безжизненные пустыни.

— Как же хочется вернуться обратно домой…

Спустя 10,000 лет Игрок возвращается на землю.
description.uk:
Раптом опинившись в Пеклі, все, що в нього залишилося це віра і потяг до життя. Він знищував тисячі демонів на всіх колах пекла. Навіть сім верховних герцогів Ада впали після зустрічі з ним.

— Владико, навіщо вам назад на землю? Все пекло у ваших руках!

— Заткнися і продовжуй підготовку до обряду!

Ні смачної їжі, ні звичних розваг… лише жахливі демони та неживі пустелі.

— Як же хочеться повернутися додому…

Через 10.000 років Гравець повертається на землю.
description.pt-br: Um dia, KangWoo de repente foi para o Inferno, apenas com seu forte desejo de sobreviver e com sua Autoridade de Predação. Em todo seu caminho do 1ºinferno até o 9º, ele devorou centenas de milhares de demônios, até que os Sete Arquiduques finalmente se ajoelhassem diante dele. “Por que deseja voltar? Você já não possuí tudo aqui no Inferno, meu lorde?” “O que tenho exatamente?” Não tinha nada para comer, nem sequer um entretenimento! Ilhas desoladas e demônios medonhos preenchiam todo o Inferno. “Vou voltar.” Depois de dez mil anos no 9ºInferno, ele retornou à Terra.

altTitles.ja: いとこのお姉ちゃんに甘えちゃう？

altTitles.en: I'll Be Spoiled by My Big Sis Cousin?

description.en:
***A heart-pounding new life together with my "big sis cousin"!?***

Masato Ooizumi just entered high school and he finds himself staying with a relative. 
Living there is his "big sister cousin" who's being way too close with him!?
A slightly naughty, living together romcom begins under one roof!!

(Source: Ultra Jump)

---

Serialization published in Ultra Jump starting in the June 2024 issue, released on May 17th, 2024.
description.ja:
セクシーすぎる“いとこのお姉ちゃん”とドキドキ新生活！？

高校進学を機に、親戚の家に居候することになった大泉将人。
そこには距離感が近すぎる“いとこのお姉ちゃん”が居て……!?
一つ屋根の下、ちょっぴりHな同居ラブコメディ開幕!!
description.es-la: Una Comedia Romántica entre Primos, Un chico que apenas comenzó el Instituto y Una Onee-chan que ya va en la Universidad, esto definitivamente te encantará~

altTitles.ja: ヤンキーJKクズハナちゃん

altTitles.pt-br: Garota Delinquente Do Ensino Médio KuzuHana-chan

description.en:
At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! 

While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone.

Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
description.fr:
Au début de l'année scolaire, Saotome Hodaka intègre le lycée préfectoral de Moteshiro, ancien établissement réservé aux filles et récemment devenu mixte. Il découvre rapidement que le ratio garçons/filles est de 1:359 !

Bien que cela puisse sembler être un paradis pour certains, la majorité des élèves sont des délinquantes, et Saotome se retrouve aussitôt extorqué par certaines des filles les plus agressives. Par chance, il est sauvé malgré lui par Hanako Kuzuryu, une belle délinquante qui aspire seulement à être laissée en paix.

Est-ce le début d'une nouvelle amitié ? Comment la vie de Saotome évoluera-t-elle dans une école pleine de filles turbulentes ?
description.ja:
男女比率1対359!!　359人の女子高生にいじられまくり!!　つらたんハーレム学園ラブコメ!!　コワかわ最強ヒロイン爆誕!!
四方八方ギャルだらけな県立茂手城高校に入学した黒一点・早乙女穂高は、ヤンキーJK・九頭竜華子にピンチを救われて…!?
description.pt-br:
Uma proporção de homem para mulher de 1:359?!

Saotome-kun é admitido em uma escola cheia de gyarus e conhece uma garota delinqüente chamada Hanako Kuzuryu.

description.en:
The strongest hero of humanity, Kim Sung Bin.

He threw everything on the line and fought… but he still couldn’t prevent the destruction of the world.

However, his legend has just begun as he returns 20 years into the past.

“I’ll definitely… kill it this time.”

Now fully equipped with overwhelming power and experience, the hero’s raid isn’t over yet!
description.ko:
인류 최강의 영웅, 김성인
모든 것을 내던지며 분투했지만
결국…… 세상의 멸망은 막지 못했다

하지만 그의 전설은 이제 시작이었으니
성인, 20년 전으로 회귀하다!

“이번에는…… 반드시 잡는다.”

압도적인 재능과 경험으로 무장한 완전체
영웅의 레이드는 아직 끝나지 않았다!
description.ru: Сильнейший герой человечества Ким Сон Бин. Он бросил все на кон и сражался, но… не cмог предотвратить разрушение мира. Однако его легенда только начинается, когда Сон Бин возвращается на 20 лет в прошлое.
description.pt-br:
O herói mais forte da humanidade, Kim Sung Bin.

Ele jogou tudo na linha e lutou... mas ele ainda não conseguiu impedir a destruição do mundo.

No entanto, sua lenda apenas começou quando ele retorna 20 anos no passado.

"Com certeza... vou matá-lo desta vez."

Agora totalmente equipado com poder e experiência esmagadores, o ataque do herói ainda não acabou!

altTitles.en: I Will Politely Decline the Male Lead!

altTitles.mn: Би эелдэгээр эрэгтэй гол дүрээс татгалзах болно!

altTitles.ja: 男主人公は丁重にお断りします！

altTitles.zh-hk: 我會禮貌地拒絕男主角

description.en:
A girl obsessed with a novel suddenly finds herself transported into the thick of the plot. The problem is, she has taken on the role of the villain in the story. And she knows how this ends… it's off with her head! Maybe she'll just let this play out and wake up back in reality… But after a few too many deaths to no avail, it's finally time to go off-script. She's going to have a little fun with this tale. She's made up her mind… to live!

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)
description.fr:
Condamnée à mourir le jour de ses 20 ans puis à ressusciter encore et toujours pour l'éternité, c'est là, sa malédiction. Mais quitte à voir son avenir ruiné, autant vivre comme on le souhaite! La méchante est bien décidée à suivre cet adage et a changé l'histoire du roman où elle se trouve. L'héroïne, sa rivale? Plus question! Elle est tellement adorable, plutôt en faire sa meilleure amie! Le fiancé? Un prince héritier cruel et idiot, mieux vaut l'éliminer du paysage. Cependant, à chacune de ses décisions s'éloignant de l'histoire originale, le futur se modifie. Jusqu'où va-t-elle bouleverser le cours du roman et tous ses personnages?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)
description.ko:
비참하게 처형당하는 소설의 악역으로 빙의했다.
사망플래그를 피하기 위해 별짓 다 해봤지만, 돌아오는 건 결국 죽음뿐.
세 번째 회귀하던 날, 나는 결심했다.
막 살기로!

“이렇게 살아도 죽고, 저렇게 살아도 살해당하는 판에
나 하고 싶은 대로 하고 살겠다!”

그러나 원작에서 너무 멀어진 탓일까.
원래대로라면 원작 여주에게 향했어야 할 남주들의 관심이
어째서인지 나한테 향하는 것 같다……?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)
description.uk:
Вона стала лиходійкою в романі, якій судилося жалісна смерть. У своєму першому житті вона пішла за оригінальною історією і померла. Потім знову прокинулась в тілі лиходійки. Під час наступної спроби вона робила все, щоб уникнути смерті, але врешті-решт її знову чекала лише вона.
Як би я не жила, все одно помру, чи не краще жити так, як хочеться?
Проте, щось я надто далеко відійшла від оригінального сюжету. Чому раптом головний герой зацікавився мною?...

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)
description.zh-hk:
她在一部小說中被當作惡棍附身，在小說中被悲慘地處決。

我嘗試了一切來避免死亡標誌，但最終，只有死亡浮出水面。在第三次回歸的那天，我下定了決心。讓我們活下去吧！

"如果我這樣生活，我會死，如果我那樣生活，我會被殺！"

但這是因為它離原版太遠了嗎？主角對原版女主角的興趣似乎以某種方式針對了我......？

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)

title.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Finding the girl behind the voice.

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
***「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。***

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!!アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

title.en: Elf to Bike to Teikoku Chiri Chousain to

altTitles.ja: エルフとバイクと帝国地理調査員と

altTitles.en: Elf and Bike and Imperial Geographic Surveyor and...

description.en: Road-movie-like manga about the perky elf and her rugged sidekick, who explores and maps an area where the situation is unclear. -AMAZ
description.ja: 帝国地理院の調査員の助手をしているエルフのノノアはバイクを駆り、相棒のカゴ―と2人で大きく変わってしまった、魑魅魍魎が跋扈する地方の街道沿いを調査。地図を更新する仕事をしていた。休息がてら泉で水浴びするノノアだが、その前に現われたのは…!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Class no Gal ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu

altTitles.ja: クラスのギャルに空気扱いされています

description.en: A boy named Aizawa is getting treated by his gyaru classmates like he wasn't there, like this girl named Aino who sits on his seat. With him still in it.
description.es-la: Un par de gals parecen no notar al chico delante de ellas.

description.en:
The story of two foreign men living in Japan.

(from ebookjapan):

Nick, with his stylish hair, and Lever, with his dazzling eyes behind his sunglasses, are a HOT & CRAZY foreign duo who will face any obstacles that come their way! 

The genius Kyogoro Miyata, who wastes no time in drawing, unleashes a shocking high-speed manga. Nick and Lever are finally here!
description.es-la: Esta es la historia de dos extranjeros que viven en Japón: Nick, con su elegante melena, y Lever, con sus deslumbrantes ojos que se ocultan detrás de sus gafas de sol. Este alocado dúo se enfrentará a cualquier obstáculo que se les presente mientras tratan de sobrevivir día a día en la tierra del sol naciente.
